item.title: A Search Engine for Academic Computer VisionÂ Papers
item.description: We built a new search engine for papers published on ICCV and CVPR in recent years, which has been deployed on AWS and can be accessed via this link. Full code is available on our Github.

item.title: [Leetcode] Algorithms on Graphs
item.description: This post covers 6 types of algorithms on graph that people may encounter when they are doing leetcode for graph-related problems.

item.title: [Notes] HBase - Wide-Column Storage Database
item.description: HBase is a column storage database that can have many different columns, and it is allowed for columns to contain no values. So HBase is a good way of representing sparse tables…

item.title: All About AUC
item.description: The definition, equivalent form and calculation of AUC.

item.title: Evolvement of Recommendation System Algorithms
item.description: This blog covers introduction to common algorithms in recommendation systems including Collaborative Filtering, Factorization Machine, Wide&Deep and DeepFM.

item.title: A Survey on Rule Learning in Text Mining
item.description: A short review of some recent researches on logic reasoning.

item.title: A Simple Guide to Subgradient
item.description: For non-smooth (non-differentiable) functions, subgradients can work as well as gradients when it comes to optimization. Check the definition and principle of subgradients here.
